Trigger: When the efficiency score has been above 95% for more than 15 seconds.
Body: Oh wow! You are doing such a great job!
The city is looking good. Power up! I'm buying you a cappucino.
Make sure to keep an eye on the power demand.

Body: Look at the forecast and plan ahead.
